trans-unit.source: Business Central and Power BI Content Packs| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Business Central and Power BI Content Packs| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Business Central a balíčky obsahu Power BI | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Getting insight, business intelligence, and KPIs from your Business Central data is easy with Power BI and the Business Central content packs.

seg-source.mrk: Getting insight, business intelligence, and KPIs from your Business Central data is easy with Power BI and the Business Central content packs.

target.mrk: Získávání přehledu, business intelligence, a indikátorů KPI z vašich Business Central dat je snadné s Power BI a s balíčky obsahu Business Central.

trans-unit.source: Enabling Your Business Data for Power BI

seg-source.mrk: Enabling Your Business Data for Power BI

target.mrk: Povolení obchodních dat pro Power BI

trans-unit.source: Getting insights into your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data is easy with Power BI and the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] content packs.

seg-source.mrk: Getting insights into your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data is easy with Power BI and the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] content packs.

target.mrk: Získávání přehledů o vašich [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] datech je snadné díky Power BI a balíčkům obsahu [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Power BI retrieves your data and then builds an out-of-the-box dashboard and reports based on that data.

seg-source.mrk: Power BI retrieves your data and then builds an out-of-the-box dashboard and reports based on that data.

target.mrk: Power BI načítá vaše data a poté sestaví řídící panel a přehledy vycházející z těchto dat.

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid account with Dynamics 365 and with Power BI.

seg-source.mrk: You must have a valid account with Dynamics 365 and with Power BI.

target.mrk: Musíte mít platný účet v Dynamics 365 a ve službě Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Also, you must download [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/) if you wish to create your own Power BI reports.

seg-source.mrk: Also, you must download [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/) if you wish to create your own Power BI reports.

target.mrk: Pokud si chcete vytvořit vlastní sestavy Power BI, musíte si také stáhnout [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/).

trans-unit.source: Power BI content packs require permissions to the tables where data is retrieved from.

seg-source.mrk: Power BI content packs require permissions to the tables where data is retrieved from.

target.mrk: Balíčky obsahu Power BI vyžadují oprávnění k tabulkám, ze kterých se získávají data.

trans-unit.source: More details on the requirements are described below.

seg-source.mrk: More details on the requirements are described below.

target.mrk: Další podrobnosti o požadavcích jsou popsány níže.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft has published the following content packs:

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft has published the following content packs:

trans-unit.source: Provides a dashboard with key financial data over time, such as earnings versus expenses, operating margin, and cash cycle.

seg-source.mrk: Provides a dashboard with key financial data over time, such as earnings versus expenses, operating margin, and cash cycle.

target.mrk: Poskytuje řídicí panel s klíčovými finančními údaji v průběhu času, jako jsou příjmy versus náklady, provozní marže a hotovostní cyklus.

trans-unit.source: Provides a dashboard with key data about sales opportunities and contacts.

seg-source.mrk: Provides a dashboard with key data about sales opportunities and contacts.

target.mrk: Poskytuje řídicí panel s klíčovými údaji o prodejních příležitostech a kontaktech.

trans-unit.source: Provides a dashboard with key data about sales and inventory.

seg-source.mrk: Provides a dashboard with key data about sales and inventory.

target.mrk: Poskytuje řídicí panel s klíčovými údaji o prodejích a zásobách.

trans-unit.source: Each content pack provides reports that you can drill into:

seg-source.mrk: Each content pack provides reports that you can drill into:

target.mrk: Každá sada obsahu obsahuje sestavy, které můžete procházet:

trans-unit.source: Choose any visual on the dashboard to bring up one of the underlying reports.

seg-source.mrk: Choose any visual on the dashboard to bring up one of the underlying reports.

target.mrk: Vyberte jakýkoli vizuální prvek na řídícím panelu a nadneste jednu ze základních sestav

trans-unit.source: Filter the report or add fields that you want to monitor.

seg-source.mrk: Filter the report or add fields that you want to monitor.

target.mrk: Filtrování sestavy nebo přidání polí, které chcete sledovat.

trans-unit.source: Pin this customized view to the dashboard to continue tracking.

seg-source.mrk: Pin this customized view to the dashboard to continue tracking.

target.mrk: Připojte toto přizpůsobené zobrazení k řídicímu panelu a pokračujte ve sledování.

trans-unit.source: You can refresh data manually, and you can set up a refresh schedule.

seg-source.mrk: You can refresh data manually, and you can set up a refresh schedule.

target.mrk: Data můžete aktualizovat ručně, a můžete nastavit plán aktualizace.

trans-unit.source: The content packs are preconfigured to work with data from the demonstration company that you get when you sign up for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: The content packs are preconfigured to work with data from the demonstration company that you get when you sign up for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Balíčky obsahu jsou překonfigurovány pro práci s daty z demonstrační společnosti, které získáte, když se zaregistrujete do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When you install the apps in Power BI, and you connect to your own data, some reports may not work because they rely on data that your company does not have.

seg-source.mrk: When you install the apps in Power BI, and you connect to your own data, some reports may not work because they rely on data that your company does not have.

target.mrk: Při instalaci aplikací v Power BI a připojení k vlastním datům nemusí některé sestavy fungovat, protože se spoléhají na data, která vaše společnost nemá.

trans-unit.source: In those cases, you can simply remove that report from your dashboard.

seg-source.mrk: In those cases, you can simply remove that report from your dashboard.

target.mrk: V těchto případech můžete tuto sestavu jednoduše odstranit z řídicího panelu.

trans-unit.source: You can also build your own reports and dashboards in Power BI based on your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data.

seg-source.mrk: You can also build your own reports and dashboards in Power BI based on your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data.

target.mrk: Na základě vašich [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] dat si také můžete v Power BI vytvořit vlastní sestavy a řídící panely.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Connecting Your Business Data to Power BI](across-how-use-financials-data-source-powerbi.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Connecting Your Business Data to Power BI](across-how-use-financials-data-source-powerbi.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Připojení obchodních dat k Power BI](across-how-use-financials-data-source-powerbi.md).

trans-unit.source: Select **Get Data** at the bottom of the left navigation pane.

seg-source.mrk: Select **Get Data** at the bottom of the left navigation pane.

target.mrk: V dolní části levého navigačního podokna vyberte možnost **Získat data**.

trans-unit.source: You may also get starting from within Dynamics 365 Business Edition.

seg-source.mrk: You may also get starting from within Dynamics 365 Business Edition.

target.mrk: Můžete také začít přímo z Dynamics 365 Business Edition.

trans-unit.source: From the role center, navigate to **Report Selection** in the Power BI Role Center part.

seg-source.mrk: From the role center, navigate to **Report Selection** in the Power BI Role Center part.

target.mrk: Z centra rolí přejděte do části **Výběr sestavy** v části Centrum rolí Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Select either **Service** or **My Organization** from the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Select either **Service** or **My Organization** from the ribbon.

target.mrk: Z pásu karet vyberte buď **Služba** nebo **Moje organizace**.

trans-unit.source: When either of these actions are selected, you will be taken to either the Organization gallery in Power BI or to the services library in Power BI, which will also be filtered to only display content packs related to [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: When either of these actions are selected, you will be taken to either the Organization gallery in Power BI or to the services library in Power BI, which will also be filtered to only display content packs related to [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

target.mrk: Pokud je vybrána některá z těchto akcí, budete přesměrováni do Galerie organizace v Power BI nebo do knihovny služeb v Power BI, která bude také filtrována, aby zobrazovala pouze balíčky obsahu související s [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This will open a page with the **AppSource** and **Apps for Power BI apps**.

seg-source.mrk: This will open a page with the **AppSource** and **Apps for Power BI apps**.

target.mrk: Otevře se stránka s **AppSource** a **Aplikace pro Power BI**.

seg-source.mrk: Choose content packs from online services

target.mrk: Vyberte si balíčky obsahu z online služeb

trans-unit.source: Select **Apps** from the **Apps for Power BI apps** tab, choose the **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central** content pack that you want to use, and then select **Get it now**.

seg-source.mrk: Select **Apps** from the **Apps for Power BI apps** tab, choose the **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central** content pack that you want to use, and then select **Get it now**.

target.mrk: Vyberte kartu **Aplikace** na kartě **Aplikace pro Power BI**, vyberte balíček obsahu **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central**, který chcete použít, a poté vyberte **Získat nyní**.

trans-unit.source: ![Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now](./media/across-how-to-connect-powerbi-d365-content-packs/powerbi-dynamics365-for-financials-get-it-now.png)

seg-source.mrk: Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now

target.mrk: Zvolte Dynamics 365 Business Central a vyberte Získat nyní.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, enter the name of *your company* in [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: When prompted, enter the name of *your company* in [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

target.mrk: Po zobrazení výzvy zadejte název *vaší společnosti* v [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This is not the display name.

seg-source.mrk: This is not the display name.

trans-unit.source: The company name can be found on the 'Companies' page within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] instance.

seg-source.mrk: The company name can be found on the 'Companies' page within your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] instance.

target.mrk: Název společnosti naleznete na stránce „Společnosti“ ve vaší instanci [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: ![Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now](./media/across-how-to-connect-powerbi-d365-content-packs/powerbi-connect-to-d365-finance-and-operations-crm.png)

seg-source.mrk: Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now

target.mrk: Zvolte Dynamics 365 Business Central a vyberte Získat nyní.

trans-unit.source: Once connected, a dashboard, report and dataset will automatically be loaded into your Power BI workspace.

seg-source.mrk: Once connected, a dashboard, report and dataset will automatically be loaded into your Power BI workspace.

target.mrk: Po připojení se do pracovního prostoru Power BI automaticky načte řídicí panel, sestava a datová sada.

trans-unit.source: When completed, the tiles will update with data from your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] company.

seg-source.mrk: When completed, the tiles will update with data from your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] company.

target.mrk: Po dokončení se dlaždice aktualizují údaji z vaší [!INCLUDE[d365fin_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] společnosti.

trans-unit.source: ![Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now](./media/across-how-to-connect-powerbi-d365-content-packs/powerbi-workspace-dashboard-report-dataset.png)

seg-source.mrk: Select Dynamics 365 Business Central and select Get it now

target.mrk: Zvolte Dynamics 365 Business Central a vyberte Získat nyní.

trans-unit.source: Try [asking a question in the Q&A box](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/service-q-and-a-tips) at the top of the dashboard.

seg-source.mrk: Try [asking a question in the Q&A box](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/service-q-and-a-tips) at the top of the dashboard.

target.mrk: Zkuste [Zadání dotazu v poli Q&A](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/service-q-and-a-tips) v horní části řídicího panelu.

trans-unit.source: [Select a tile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/service-dashboard-tiles) to open the underlying report.

seg-source.mrk: [Select a tile](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/service-dashboard-tiles) to open the underlying report.

trans-unit.source: While your dataset will be scheduled to refreshed daily, you can change the refresh schedule or try refreshing it on demand using **Refresh Now**.

seg-source.mrk: While your dataset will be scheduled to refreshed daily, you can change the refresh schedule or try refreshing it on demand using **Refresh Now**.

target.mrk: I když bude vaše datová sada denně aktualizována, můžete plán aktualizace aktualizovat nebo zkusit aktualizovat na požádání, pomocí funkce **Aktualizovat hned**.

trans-unit.source: To import your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] data into Power BI, you need to have permissions to the web services used to retrieve data.

seg-source.mrk: To import your [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] data into Power BI, you need to have permissions to the web services used to retrieve data.

target.mrk: Chcete-li importovat svá [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] data do Power BI, musíte mít oprávnění k webovým službám používaným pro získávání dat.

trans-unit.source: The web services required for each content pack include:

seg-source.mrk: The web services required for each content pack include:

target.mrk: Webové služby vyžadované pro každý balíček obsahu zahrnují:

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Customers List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Seznam zákazníků

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - General Ledger Entries List**

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - General Ledger Entries List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Seznam věcných položek

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Items List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Seznam Zboží

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Jobs List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - Seznam projektů

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Purchase Invoices List**

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Purchase Invoices List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - Seznam nákupních fakturr

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Sales Orders List**

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Sales Orders List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - Seznam prodejních objednávek

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central – Vendors List

target.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central - Seznam dodavatelů

trans-unit.source: An easy way to find the web services is to search for web services in [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: An easy way to find the web services is to search for web services in [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

target.mrk: Snadným způsobem, jak najít webové služby, je vyhledávání webových služeb v [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In the list make sure the Publish box is marked for the web services listed above.

seg-source.mrk: In the list make sure the Publish box is marked for the web services listed above.

target.mrk: V seznamu zkontrolujte, zda je u výše uvedených webových služeb zaškrtnuto políčko Publikovat.

trans-unit.source: The Power BI dashboard relies on the published web services that are listed above, and it will show data from the demonstration company or your own company if you import data from your current finance solution.

seg-source.mrk: The Power BI dashboard relies on the published web services that are listed above, and it will show data from the demonstration company or your own company if you import data from your current finance solution.

target.mrk: Řídicí panel Power BI se spoléhá na publikované webové služby, které jsou uvedeny výše, a bude zobrazovat data z demonstrační společnosti nebo vaší vlastní firmy, pokud importujete data z vašeho aktuálního finančního řešení.

trans-unit.source: However, if something goes wrong, this section provides a workaround for the most typical issues.

seg-source.mrk: However, if something goes wrong, this section provides a workaround for the most typical issues.

target.mrk: Pokud se však něco pokazí, tato část poskytuje řešení pro nejtypičtějších problémy.

trans-unit.source: A common mistake is to enter the company display name instead of the company name.

seg-source.mrk: A common mistake is to enter the company display name instead of the company name.

target.mrk: Častou chybou je, že místo názvu společnosti zadáte zobrazovaný název společnosti.

trans-unit.source: To find the company name search for **Companies**.

seg-source.mrk: To find the company name search for **Companies**.

trans-unit.source: Then use the **Name** field when entering your company name.

seg-source.mrk: Then use the **Name** field when entering your company name.

target.mrk: Při zadávání názvu společnosti použijte pole **Název**.

trans-unit.source: The user name and password used to connect will be the same as what is used to connect to your Microsoft Office 365 account.

seg-source.mrk: The user name and password used to connect will be the same as what is used to connect to your Microsoft Office 365 account.

target.mrk: Uživatelské jméno a heslo použité pro připojení bude stejné jako to, které se používá pro připojení k vašemu účtu Microsoft Office 365.

trans-unit.source: The content packs also require that you have a Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] account.

seg-source.mrk: The content packs also require that you have a Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] account.

target.mrk: Balíčky obsahu také vyžadují, abyste měli účet Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Once you enter your credentials, we will auto discover any Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] tenants you have access to.

seg-source.mrk: Once you enter your credentials, we will auto discover any Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] tenants you have access to.

target.mrk: Jakmile zadáte své přihlašovací údaje, automaticky zjistíme všechny klienty Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)], ke kterým máte přístup.

trans-unit.source: If you do not have a licensed or trial Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] account, you will receive an error message.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not have a licensed or trial Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] account, you will receive an error message.

target.mrk: Pokud nemáte licencovaný nebo zkušební účet Microsoft [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long_md](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)], zobrazí se chybová zpráva.

trans-unit.source: The Key Didn't Match Any Rows in the Table

seg-source.mrk: The Key Didn't Match Any Rows in the Table

target.mrk: Klíč neodpovídal žádným řádkům v tabulce

trans-unit.source: If you enter a non-valid company name during the connection process, you may get the error message "The key didn't match any rows in the table".

seg-source.mrk: If you enter a non-valid company name during the connection process, you may get the error message "The key didn't match any rows in the table".

target.mrk: Pokud během procesu připojení zadáte neplatný název společnosti, může se zobrazit chybová zpráva „Klíč neodpovídá žádným řádkům v tabulce“.

trans-unit.source: Provide the correct company name and try connecting again.

seg-source.mrk: Provide the correct company name and try connecting again.

target.mrk: Zadejte správný název společnosti a zkuste se znovu připojit.

seg-source.mrk: Importing Business Data from Other Finance Systems

target.mrk: Import obchodních dat z jiných finančních systémů.

seg-source.mrk: Importing Business Data from Other Finance Systems

target.mrk: Import obchodních dat z jiných finančních systémů.

seg-source.mrk: Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a Power BI Data Source

target.mrk: Použití [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako zdroje dat Power BI

seg-source.mrk: Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a PowerApps Data Source
